pr_title: Issue 5020: Change slack link on README to point to the sign-up page

timeline.message:
Update the support section

* Removed the reference to the google groups discussion forum
* Added a link to the slack signup page.
* Fixed a small typo

Signed-off-by: rofr <robert@devrex.se>

Update the support section

* Removed the reference to the google groups discussion forum
* Added a link to the slack signup page.
* Fixed a small typo

Signed-off-by: rofr <robert@devrex.se>

timeline.bodyText: Looks good. One question: would it make sense to have both a "login here" and "sign up here"?
timeline.author: fpj
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Both links are there? The slack link brings you to the login page.
replies.author: rofr
